channel.title: Code Review on Michael Dorner
channel.description: Recent content in Code Review on Michael Dorner

item.title: Need for Tax Compliance in Software Engineering
item.description: In third blog post in the series on tax compliance in software engineering, we will estimate the prevelance of cross-border collaboration, and therefore, the need for tax compliance in software engineering by measuring cross-border code review in a multinational software company.

item.title: The Upper Bound of Information Diffusion in Code Review
item.description: Michael Dorner, Daniel Mendez, Krzysztof Wnuk, and Jacek Czerwonka

item.title: Taxing Collaborative Software Engineering
item.description: Michael Dorner, Maximilian Capraro, Oliver Treidler, Tom-Eric Kunz, Darja Šmite, Ehsan Zabardast, Daniel Mendez, and Krzysztof Wnuk

item.title: Only Time Will Tell: Modelling Information Diffusion in Code Review with Time-Varying Hypergraphs
item.description: Michael Dorner, Darja Smite, Daniel Mendez, Krzysztof Wnuk, and Jacek Czerwonka
